jump_scares.spoiler: Beau is attacked by one of the creatures (while we get some warning the attack is quite loud and violent)
Regan knocks over a lamp during a game of monopoly and the ensuing loud noise during a previously quiet scene may be quite startling for some viewers
There is a loud bang on the roof of the house
As Lee listens by a window, a raccoon suddenly screeches and runs past
A raccoon is suddenly attacked by one of the creatures
As Regan is about to descend the stairs, Lee grabs her and pulls her back
Marcus walks past an old man who is watching him in the background
A creature walks past the doorway above the stairs
The creature makes a loud noise
Evelyn puts a bloodied hand on the shower window startling Lee
As Regan goes to pick up the torch, Marcus grabs her wrist
Marcus falls through a metal door and lands in the grain silo
The creature drops down into the grain silo beside Regan
After a period of silence we see the creature outside the car, the creature then breaks through the window with a loud crash
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
After holding the map up to the car window, Lorraine suddenly moves it away. The sudden noise and movement accompanied by the tension of the scene may startle some people
As Lorraine looks into the rear view mirror during a tense scene, the car horn suddenly blares
As Ed says “that should do it” and lowers the bonnet, Lorraine sees a group of ghosts standing behind him, seconds later one of the ghosts pushes Ed to the ground
A truck suddenly appears out of the fog and almost runs Ed over
A box on the shelf suddenly closes startling Daniela
As Daniela approaches the empty rocking chair, the door suddenly slams closed
As the camera pans across to Daniela, we see the disfigured face of her father beside her and he screams “you did this to me!”
As the door to the chicken coup closes, we here loud snarling noises from the dog outside
As Mary Ellen holds the silver coin up, the Ferryman suddenly appears in front of her
Judy is suddenly pulled towards the end of the bed
Accompanied by a sound effect, Judy is pulled back once again
Judy looks under the bed sheets and sees Annabelle, suddenly a girl jumps out of the sheets ad attacks Judy
After seeing the shadow of the demon on her wall, the demon suddenly appears beside Judy
After Judy escapes the bedroom and reunites with Mary Ellen, the door is pushed open and we hear a demonic roar
As Daniela says “everything”, all the objects in the room suddenly turn on at once
The bride suddenly grabs Daniela around the neck
One of the windows in the car breaks startling Judy
The dog suddenly jumps on the roof of the car
The Mary Ellen doppelganger holding Annabelle suddenly screams
As Judy attempts to put Annabelle back in her case, the door shuts and Judy turns around to see the demon right behind her
A torch is briefly shone on a figure before the camera footage cuts out
A loud bang startles James in his tent
Lisa suddenly bursts into James’ tent
There is a burst of static from the walkie-talkie during a quiet scene
Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out
Ashley suddenly pulls Lisa’s hand away from the camera
James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams
A branch snaps and a hysterical Talia appears in front of James
A tent flies into the air
An unseen force pulls Ashley out of the tree
A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James
A disheveled Lane suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lane runs at Lisa while screaming
There are several loud whooshing noises
Lane sees a tall thin figure coming towards her in a hallway
James runs into Lisa
A shadowy figure passes the window behind James and the camera footage cuts out
An image of James with a disfigured face briefly flashes across the camera footage
A loud bang in an otherwise quiet scene may startle some people
Anne shines the torch on a figure standing in the darkness
An invisible force appears to drag Patient 11 away
Patient 11 suddenly screams and pounds on the observation window
Anne sees a mysterious figure standing by the window
There is a loud bang followed by screaming
Anne shines the torch on Callie who now has black eyes and is vomiting a red liquid
Patient 14 begins to scream and shake violently
Patient 14 suddenly appears in front of the scientist
Anne looks in the car mirror and sees Thomas’s face has turned a red color
A hand grabs Anne around the ankle as she walks up the stairs
Thomas wakes up in the back seat and yells which startles Anne
A researcher gets an electric shock
The corpse on the examination table suddenly screams and grabs the researcher around the neck
Anne looks into a hole built into the wall and a pale face with hollow eyes suddenly appears
Anne looks down a corridor and sees an alien figure coming towards her
Something begins to bang on the door
A hand with long fingers suddenly appears on the locker that Anne is hiding in
Anne turns around and sees a grotesque figure standing beside her
Anne turns around and sees her friends face has the same black eyes and deformed expression as previous victims
Clara turns the light off and Candyman appears behind her for a brief moment. [Video]
Trevor jumps onto Helen while she is in bed
Helen takes a photo of a door and at the same time, the door opens and a dog barks
Bernie is startled by Helen poking her head through the hole in the wall
Helen closes the medicine cabinet and in the mirror a girl and her dog can be seen
Helen looks into a window and a dog jumps up from the other side
There is an abrupt flashback to a boy screaming
Images of the graffitied head on the wall flash up accompanied by loud noises
Candyman’s hook comes through the medicine cabinet at Helen. [Video]
Helen runs into the living room and sees Bernie’s bloodied body
Candyman’s hand appears above Helen
Candyman’s hook appears in front of the baby
Dr. Burke is stabbed by Candyman
Candyman opens his eyes as Helen is about to attack him
Candyman appears and puts his hand over Helen’s mouth
Helen appears behind Trevor in the mirror. [Video]
The sticky hand hits the wall
The door is pushed open
The booth door blows open after the lights flicker
After a tense scene a girl walks by laughing
While Oliver is holding the camera up, the skeleton face growls loudly
The lightbulbs start to break
The table starts to move
A chair moves when she says “Hello
There is a jump cut back to Larry attacking Byron
The closet door is pushed open
There is a loud crunch as Larry is seen in the reflection of the window
The hand in the screen cracks before Larry attacks
Larry appears in the window and growls
Larry drops down to the floor
Larry charges out of the grass
The sheet on top of the doll suddenly lifts off and wraps itself around Lisa. [Video]
Jamie sees the doll standing beside his bed. [Video]
Jamie sees an old lady behind the curtain, the camera zooms in on her face
As the camera flashes, an image if Lisa’s dead face flashes up on the screen briefly
Jamie sees the doll in the drivers side window of the car. [Video]
Jamie comes out of the bathroom and sees the doll
Young Henry sees Mary’s dead body lying beside him
The reflection of a dead lady can be seen briefly in the mirror
Henry turns around and sees Mary Shaw behind him. [Video]
Detective Lipton begins speaking behind Jamie
The dead boy’s head jerks back, starling Detective Lipton
Detective Liptons dead body comes out from behind the curtain
Jamie sees Mary Shaw’s face as he tries to climb back on to the bridge
Mary Shaw comes through the window
Ella appears behind Jamie
The toy’s sudden noise may startle some viewers
Eric gets scared by Sara when she opens the bathroom door
The toy’s noise startles Eric
A loud sound comes from the walkie-talkie
After a tense scene, Daniel’s hand suddenly covers Eric’s mouth
The TV turns on loudly
Daniel jumping from the chair after hearing to Eric’s voice along with a loud sound may startle some viewers
Daniel’s voice scares Ruth
The voice of Ruth interrupting the silent tense scene may startle some viewers
After a tense scene, a loud noise comes out of Gérman’s headphones
The screen cuts abruptly to a woman screaming
A toy’s noise spooks Sara
When Sara tries to touch Eric, he quickly crawls under the bed
Eric jumps off the bed to the front of Sara
The witch puts her hand on Sara’s face accompanied by a loud noise
The hanged body of Sara bursts through the room’s window
Something jumps on Daniel
A gunshot is fired frightening Ruth and Gérman
The scene cuts abruptly to a man yelling
A screaming woman runs by in front of Gérman
The witch jumps on Gérman
The witch screams at Ruth twice
Eric runs past Daniel accompanied by a loud sound
The witch screams at Daniel
Some viewers might get scared when Ruth shows up in front of Gérman

In a post-credit scene, a woman being exorcised jumps and screams
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
The doors burst open
Ganush charges at Christine
A handkerchief suddenly appears in front of Christine’s windscreen
Ganush attacks Christine in the car
Ganush attacks Christine again
Rham Jas suddenly has a vision of a fiery demon as he is reading Christine’s fortune. [Video]
A gust of wind startles Christine
The pots in the kitchen start to clatter into each other
An unseen force knocks Christine back
Ganush suddenly appears in bed beside Christine. [Video]
The silhouette of Lamia pops up in front of Christine
The image of Ganush suddenly appears on Christine’s phone
Lamia appears at the window in front of Christine
A black cat hisses at Christine
Christine pulls back a curtain in the shed to reveal Ganush. [Video]
The sound of a goat bleating startles Christine
There is a loud noise as the spirit enters Shaun
Chrstine goes to check on the assistant, but he turns around suddenly revealing he has been possessed
Christine sees Ganush on the road
Ganush’s handkerchief appears on Chrstine’s windscreen while she is driving
The handkerchief comes out of the fan vent and lands on Christine’s face
Christine pulls at the corpse of Ganush and it suddenly comes free
Ganush’s corpse pops up out of the water
A man appears behind Mark
As Mark speaks into his walkie-talkie, an unconscious man suddenly rears up and grabs Mark
A barking dog suddenly lunges at the car window
The sound of glass breaking during a quiet scene may startle some viewers
As the camera pans around Michelle, a ghostly face appears behind her
A door slams
A bird flies out of a dark room
Bryan sees the ghostly image of a boy standing in front of an open door
Hands shoot out from underneath a bed that Sam is standing in front of
Jules briefly glimpses a woman climbing the stairs

Jules is suddenly pulled backwards by an unseen force

Bryan turns around to show his eyes are now black and his mouth full of a dark liquid
John turns around and is attacked by Bryan
Bryan suddenly opens his eyes and attacks an officer
A large number of birds burst out of John’s mouth

Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap

Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife

Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar

There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin

A figure runs past the screen

A girl’s possessed face flashes briefly on the screen
As she is driving, Mia sees a girl standing in the middle of the road
The girl rises up out of the water behind Mia
Mia turns around suddenly as David begins to talk to her
Mia sees the demonic girl in the mirror
There is a quick cut to Mia attacking the dog with a hammer
Mia starts to scream as the door bursts open and wind gushes in
Mia grabs Olivia’s arm as she tries to get the gun
Olivia sees a demonic version of her reflection and the mirror breaks
A loud noise coming from the cellar startles Natalie

A loud crash startles David while he is in the cellar
Mia suddenly appears and attacks David with a knife

A knife comes through the wall just in front of Mia

Father Merrin almost loses his footing while exploring the cavern
A sound effect plays as Father Merrin turns around and sees a statue

The radio suddenly turns back on, loudly playing music, which causes Sarah to scream in fright. [Video]

Jamie’s girlfriend appears behind him briefly before the phone rings

Courtney tries to leave down the fire escape but Tessa appears in front of her

Marlo is suddenly lifted in the air and thrown backwards by an unseen force

Jason comes up behind Clay as he is on top of the bus

Paulina leans in towards the seemingly dead creepy old man, who suddenly grabs her the shoulder
A sudden, very loud noise scares the entire group
Claire approaches Dave in bed before disappearing. When, Dave turns around, she is right in front of his face
While walking backwards, Alan runs into the creepy old man
The soldier touches the seemingly dead man with a knife, and he springs back up
Alan turns around, shining the light on the creepy old man who is standing right in front of him
As Paulina slowly reaches out for her son’s shoulder, he quickly turns around

There is a sudden earthquake
A closet door closes on its own, revealing Claire with a knife behind it
Claire appears on screen and screams as she attacks the camera
A sudden scream is heard in the distance
As Tyler and Paulina walk into the dark corridor, there is a gasping sound right in front of them
The camera’s night vision shows a woman right in front of Tyler and Paulina who looks up at the camera and screams
The water begins to bubble, scaring Paulina
Paulina looks up from the ground and sees her son right in front of her, who then screams
Paulina stands up, and there is a rotting corpse right in front of her face
Paulina looks down from the ceiling with the flashlight and shines it on Pepe

A startling image of some disfigured faces flashes up on the screen
As Laura backs away from the mirror, a demonic face appears beside her
A sketch of Laura’s face is pulled away from the camera suddenly to reveal a disheveled looking Marina

Gustavo runs past the camera

A figure runs at Lance in the hallway
Lance spins around to see a group of doctors working on a patient. Suddenly one jumps up close to Lance and screams

Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters

Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen

Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head

A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view

Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes

Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
There is a slight scare when a walkie talkie makes a loud noise as Georgie descends the stairs to the basement
There is another minor scare as we see Pennywise’s eyes appear at the drain grill in front of Georgie
There is a loud bang on a door as Mike takes out some rubbish
After a rather intense scene, Mike is almost run over by Henry’s car
The distorted woman from the painting appears in front of Stan
In the library basement, Ben is running away from a headless man when Pennywise suddenly appears in front of him and shouts “Egg Boy”
Ben is jumped by Patrick as he leaves the library (this is a very minor jump scare)
Patrick enters the sewerage system and uses an aerosol can and lighter flamethrower style as he hunts for Ben, suddenly he sees various dead children standing in front of him
Patrick sees a balloon in front of him and it pops to reveal Pennywise standing there
The hair from the drain suddenly winds itself around Beverly’s wrist
In the kitchen, Georgie rushes past the screen in the foreground as Bill looks on
Bill sees Georgie in the flooded basement, he slowly begins to decay and suddenly Pennywise rushes through the water towards Bill

The children are in Bill’s garage looking at various slides on a projector screen that suddenly begins to take on a life of its own. Pennywise appears on the projector screen and the kids panic and attempt to turn the projector off. Suddenly Pennywise is coming out of the projector and into the room with them
In the Neibolt street house  Richie, Bill, and Eddie see Betty begging for help at a doorway when she is suddenly pulled off screen
After Richie finds himself locked in the room full of clowns, Richie turns around and a clown doll is standing right behind him and he gets a scare

In a room full of clowns, Richie walks towards a coffin and opens it. The scene is quite suspenseful and we expect a jump scare upon the coffin being opened however the scare doesn’t occur until after Richie closes the lid and Pennywise jumps up from behind
Bill and Richie go through a door marked “not scary” and after a couple of seconds the light is turned on and we see Betty Ripson hanging by ropes
In perhaps the only truly unexpected jump scare, Beverly turns around to leave the bathroom after a confrontation with her father and is attacked by Pennywise who is standing behind her
Beverly notices a music box playing, the music stops and a second later we get a slight jump scare as a toy clown pops out of the box
Stan hears someone whispering his name, he shines the torch down the tunnel and sees Pennywise briefly appear at the opening
Stan looks around with a torch and there is a scare when the distorted woman from the painting rushes at Stan
Eddie slips into the water in a sewer tunnel and sees several floating corpses
There is a slight scare when Georgie’s motionless body suddenly starts to shake

In present day, Eddie pulls the curtain back but nothing is behind there, he turns around and is suddenly attacked by the rotting corpse
Eddie is washing his face. He adjusts the mirror to reveal Henry Bowers standing behind him
Bill collides with one of the inflatable clowns as he tries to follow the boy into the house of mirrors

The Stanley-spider suddenly runs at Richie
As Beverly says “I thought I heard something” a corpse pops up out of the water in front of her

Beverly turns her torch on, then immediately shines it on Pennywise

As Sarah slowly peeks around the corner, David quickly passes in front of her on a bike
As the group is running, a corpse falls from the sky in front of them
As the camera begins to zoom out, Sarah sees a demon standing right in front of her and screaming
The demon standing still in the alleyway suddenly begins to run at the group
Sarah shines the light on a suit of armor, startling her
A sudden loud earthquake causes startles the group
As Sarah reaches to touches Rachel’s shoulder, she quickly turns around and attacks Sarah

Sarah turns on a light and there is a demon standing right in front of her, causing her to gasp
The camera begins to glitch out and quickly zooms on the demon
Sarah shines the light on the demon, who begins to screech

Some sort of spirit flies past the camera
Mike appears behind Skylar
Something flies out of the pool

Something bangs on the bedroom window

The entity whooshes past the camera

Some sort of force radiates out from the hole in Leila’s wall

The opening scene involves the camera slowly zooming in on the trunk of a parked car while Christmas music plays. Suddenly, the trunk lock pops out and we see a woman’s eye and this is accompanied by a very loud sound effect. [Video]
Angela bumps into a security guard as she walks around a corner
As Angela enters the security office a dog barks at her
Angela trips over something on the floor

The dog barks at Angela once more as she enters the office
As the lift opens, Angela sees Thomas watching her from behind a door
A dead body falls into the flooded lift
Angela sees the policeman on the security camera, she then turns around but Thomas is standing right behind her. [Video]

The apparently dead dog suddenly barks at Angela
Angela appears behind Thomas after he opens a locker door
Angela turns the car on and loud heavy metal music plays on the radio

Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise

The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes

The creature in the window of the background suddenly appears in the foreground

As the woman approaches in the background she suddenly hits the car with a distorted appearance, paired with the car starting

The chair suddenly flies towards the camera

Davey looks through his binoculars and, accompanied by a sound effect, sees Mackey watching him from his window

Davey’s walkie talkie bursts into life startling the group

As Mary-Ann begins to scream, the Camera zooms in on her

As Emily puts her hands on a painting, a bell suddenly stars ringing
when Emily takes her hands off the painting, she sees that her hands are bleeding
After entering room 36, Liza opens the bathroom door, and sees Schweick’s corpse nailed on the wall
Liza looks through a window, and the camera suddenly shifts and zooms in on the book of Eibon
As martin looks through a book, a unseen force knocks him off the ladder

The woman on the bed turns her head suddenly and says “what did you do”
The little boy laughs and runs past Lorraine
The Lutz family suddenly appear in front of Lorraine
Lorraine looks back at the mirror and the nun is standing right behind her reflection, she looks away and looks back once more and the nun is now right in front of her. [Video]
Janet starts talking in a much deeper voice
Janet starts talking again and is revealed to be standing directly in front of Margaret’s bed
A man’s voice roars loudly. [Video]
A telephone rings during a quiet scene
Janet sees a reflection on the television of a man sitting on a chair
The man now appears behind Janet and he screams “my house”. [Video]
Janet wakes from her sleep as she crashes to the floor
A man yells and the bed sheets are pulled off Janet’s bed

A tape player suddenly turns on during a tense scene
After putting her hands around the painting the nun suddenly runs at Lorraine. [Video]
Bill shouts Janet’s name and attacks her. [Video]
Through an opening in the door Peggy sees Janet be pulled away and replaced with Bill

Ed looks up from the turntable and sees the crooked man looking at him
A loud bang startles the two girls
The door to the girl’s bedroom slams shut
Carolyn searches the house and a loud bang erupts from paintings falling off the wall
Carolyn enters the basement but as she goes to leave the door slams in her face

A monster appears on the top of the girl’s closet

Accompanied by a loud sound effect, a man suddenly sits up in his bed

Cropsy leaps up to attack Todd and Alfred. [Video]

movies.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It

jump_scares.spoiler: There is banging on the door
The shower shoots blood onto David
David charges forward with a knife
After a very tense scene Arne sees a woman who grabs him
The chainsaw starts up again in Arne’s hand
The demon Bruno charges out of the shadows
A hand comes out of the water bed
Arne’s head is grabbed by the demon behind him
Two girls with flashlights appear running and laughing
Lorraine is grabbed by a demon hand
The body in the corner reanimates and runs at Ed
The woman is behind Lorraine after she closes the door
A honking car horn startles Nicole
A man suddenly appears in the doorway as Nicole takes photos
Accompanied by a very loud sound effect, a boy appears behind a window
A demonic face briefly flashes up on Nicole’s laptop screen along with a loud sound effect
Adelina turns around quickly to reveal she is possessed
Nicole slowly approaches the door which is opening and closing by itself, suddenly she sees a screaming woman by the door trying to get in
Nicole backs away from the door and turns around to see another screaming woman standing behind her
A dog jumps up and barks at the door while Nicole is in the car
The dog jumps up at the car once more
Stefan shines the torch around the sleep-out and Adelina suddenly appears and screeches at him
While Nicole is in the bathtub, there is a loud sound effect and the lights turn off
The window slams shut
There is a knock on the door and the lights turn back on
In a dream where Nicole is having sex with Father Anton, a woman’s screaming face suddenly appears on screen and Nicole wakes up
Nicole briefly sees someone in the rear view mirror
Hands wrap around Nicole’s feet
While running through the fields, Nicole stops and turns around to see the figure from the car standing there
A low pitched demonic voice interupts Nicole’s conversation with Anton
Possessed Nicole opens her eyes as a sound effect plays
Sarah runs into Beth at the hospital

A large number of bats fly out in front of the girls

The girls run into a crawler that screams at them. [Video]

Holly’s body is dropped in front of Sarah, the creatures then proceed to eat the body

A door bursts open and a masked man stands behind it

Elizabeth turns around and the masked man is right behind her
The masked man attacks Elizabeth once more
There is a loud metallic noise
Elizabeth sees a masked man standing in a dark hallway
Elizabeth runs around a corner and comes face to face with a masked man. [Video]
A vehicle collides with the car Elizabeth is driving

A branch falls through the window of the cabin

Ash grabs Cheryl’s wrist as she struggles to get in the house

Cheryl turns around to reveal that her face has become demonic. [Video]
Possessed Cheryl suddenly jumps up and stabs Linda with a pencil
Shelly grabs Scotty around the neck. [Video]
The dismembered hand attacks Scotty. [Video]
Linda opens her eyes and sits up in bed suddenly, revealing she has also been possessed
Scotty grabs hold of Ash, begging for help

A pipe in the cellar breaks and blood gushes out

After the radio has tuned out, a girl is suddenly standing on the street
After the monster looks out of the bathtub Peter suddenly hits the window pane and frightens his wife
The monster suddenly jumps up from the edge of the bed. This happens with an extremely loud sound effect
Detective Muldoon is pushed into the sink from behind
Goodman’s colleague shoots himself off-screen. The sound is very startling
